No {{champion:11}}
At that point, I'm hoping you enjoyed dodgeball. I'm sure she'd be playing that a lot with you.

Ironically I usually used to be the last man standing back in the school.
Dodgeball also happened to be my favourite team sport.

What's not to love about a game where the main objective is to hit somebody in the face?
Because with Syndra, it's to get hit in the face.

Is that a bad thing?

http://i.imgur.com/SDxGZOm.gif?noredirect

Nope.

But it means you're no longer the last one standing.
